name: Otherdicely
description:
After a long day of never-ending work at her home, Celestine finally gets to rest. Ohhohoho, rest? That's not in our vocabulary, young lady

You have been taken to this dreamy realm, and your need to protect this realm by defeating the angelic impostor on this realm.  Fight them with strategy, and buy all u need to survive for the next day. This unknown creature its just way smarter then u think so be careful

Remember,  they attack harshly so prepare urself on the shop and took enough rest to maintain you health.

Shop

Health Potion Your generic red-colored potion that tastes like syrup. It just feels weird because you didn't see anything red on the way here. Consuming this item restores a portion of lost health.Tool kitI t's not like I'm a tool baka, but they do sell some at the shop. Increases the maximum gainable shield during combat.Shield Combat needs defense, especially when you have no idea where you are. However, this heavy-looking shield seems too heavy to carry with one hand. Boosts damage absorption capabilities.Special e dice A glowing die that looks like a perfectly-crafted diamond you saw in a jewelry store. Your dice seem to always react whenever you come close to it. adds one dice slot.Gauntlet A thin glove with steel attached to the outer finger. The merchant demonstrates its durability using a knife, and it doesn't seem to rip. Enables critical hits.Clover A four-leaf clover. Merchant's favorite and their keepsake. Increases the chance for getting higher dice numbers.

Credits
Roger Gilbert Fernandi - Game Designer
Angeline Cecilia - 2D Artist
Kensi Chandrawan - Game Designer & Programmer
Wilson Nathaniel - Game Programmer
Winson Allan Wijaya - Sound Engineer
